text:
I find it amusing it took them three games to get the actual Onett theme on the Onett stage. It's such a happy town fitting for your quaint hometown, even though in Smash, you are always in danger of vehicles driving down town streets at the speed of light.

Also, I find it amusing that they snuck in the Double Dash whistles into the song :P

author: SupraDarky

text: @SupraDarky It's actually Snowman, but it looks like they seemed to have labeled the song as "Onett/Winter" in the game
author: myohel0

text: I'm guessing a lot of you are excited for this game's release! It only took 15 years for the Onett stage to have its proper theme in a Smash game. Very fun remix, you can never go wrong with adding Snowman's theme as well, which instantly makes me want to sip some hot chocolate in front of a fireplace. Earthbound's Snowman theme is the hot chocolate of video game music (SupraDarky, 2014).
author: SupraDarky
